content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":85791,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぎょっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gah!\""},{"lineNumber":85792,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お待ちしておりました。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I have been waiting for you."},{"lineNumber":85793,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス殿」","translatedEnglishLine":"Sir Rance.\""},{"lineNumber":85794,"originalJapaneseLine":"部屋の襖を開けると、","translatedEnglishLine":"When I opened the sliding door to the room,"},{"lineNumber":85795,"originalJapaneseLine":"中では五十六が三つ指ついて頭を下げていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Inside, Isojūroku was kneeling on three fingers and bowing his head."},{"lineNumber":85796,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な、なにしてるのだ、五十六」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-what are you doing, Isojūroku?\""},{"lineNumber":85797,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なに……と、言われましても」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What... you say?\""},{"lineNumber":85798,"originalJapaneseLine":"「先程、ランス殿が私の部屋に来られるというので、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Earlier, since Sir Rance said he would come to my room,"},{"lineNumber":85799,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ここでお待ちしておりました」","translatedEnglishLine":"I have been waiting here.\""},{"lineNumber":85800,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺が来るまでずっと？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The whole time until I came?\""},{"lineNumber":85801,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes.\""},{"lineNumber":85802,"originalJapaneseLine":"「三十分くらいはあったが……マジか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It was about thirty minutes... really...?\""},{"lineNumber":85803,"originalJapaneseLine":"「？　そんなところで如何しました？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"? Is there something wrong with that?\""},{"lineNumber":85804,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さあ、どうぞ、お入り下さい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well then, please come in.\""},{"lineNumber":85805,"originalJapaneseLine":"にっこりと笑って五十六は促す。","translatedEnglishLine":"Isojūroku smiled gently and beckoned me."},{"lineNumber":85806,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、おお……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"O-oh...\""},{"lineNumber":85807,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":85808,"originalJapaneseLine":"五十六がランスの背後に近づき、","translatedEnglishLine":"Isojūroku approached behind Rance,"},{"lineNumber":85809,"originalJapaneseLine":"マントをそっと取ろうとする。","translatedEnglishLine":"and quietly tried to take his cloak off."},{"lineNumber":85810,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おおおお？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ooooh?\""},{"lineNumber":85811,"originalJapaneseLine":"「？　如何しました？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"? What's the matter?\""},{"lineNumber":85812,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、なんか、妙にサービス良くないか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, isn't this service strangely good?\""},{"lineNumber":85813,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh...?\""},{"lineNumber":85814,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ああ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Ah."},{"lineNumber":85815,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おそらく大陸とでは文化が違うのですね」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's probably that the culture is different from the continent.\""},{"lineNumber":85816,"originalJapaneseLine":"「JAPANでは、女性は婚姻すれば、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"In JAPAN, when a woman marries,"},{"lineNumber":85817,"originalJapaneseLine":"　旦那に尽くすもの」","translatedEnglishLine":"she is supposed to devote herself to her husband."},{"lineNumber":85818,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私はランス殿の、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I am not Sir Rance's,"},{"lineNumber":85819,"originalJapaneseLine":"　正室や側室の関係ではありませんが、","translatedEnglishLine":"legal wife or concubine,"},{"lineNumber":85820,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私はランス殿の子を産んだ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"but I have borne Sir Rance's child..."},{"lineNumber":85821,"originalJapaneseLine":"「家族であることに変わりはありません」","translatedEnglishLine":"That does not change the fact that we are family.\""},{"lineNumber":85822,"originalJapaneseLine":"「JAPANでは妻は旦那にこうするものですが……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"In JAPAN, the wife does this for her husband... Is there something strange about that?\""},{"lineNumber":85823,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なにか、妙ですか？」","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":85824,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、なるほど……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, I see..."},{"lineNumber":85825,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これがJAPANの一般的な妻なのか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"So this is the typical wife in JAPAN...\""},{"lineNumber":85826,"originalJapaneseLine":"（相変わらず、形式にこだわる石頭だ……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(As always, such a blockhead obsessed with formalities...)"},{"lineNumber":85827,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス殿？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sir Rance?\""},{"lineNumber":85828,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、なんでもない。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, it's nothing."},{"lineNumber":85829,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それならいいんだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"If that’s the case, then it’s fine.\""},{"lineNumber":85830,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes.\""},{"lineNumber":85831,"originalJapaneseLine":"「では、お食事になさいますか？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Now, would you like to have a meal?"},{"lineNumber":85832,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それともお風呂に？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Or perhaps take a bath?\""},{"lineNumber":85833,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":85834,"originalJapaneseLine":"「三つ目はないのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Isn’t there a third option?\""},{"lineNumber":85835,"originalJapaneseLine":"「三つ目？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A third option?\""},{"lineNumber":85836,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、まあ、いい。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, well, it’s fine."},{"lineNumber":85837,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なら、飯を食うぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Then, I’ll eat.\""},{"lineNumber":85838,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes.\""},{"lineNumber":85839,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いかがですか、料理の味は……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"How is the taste of the food...? I hope it suits your palate...\""}]}

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When I opened the sliding door to the room,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中では五十六が三つ指ついて頭を下げていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inside, Isojūroku was kneeling on three fingers and bowing his head.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「先程、ランス殿が私の部屋に来られるというので、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Earlier, since Sir Rance said he would come to my room,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここでお待ちしておりました」
「三十分くらいはあったが……マジか……」
「？　そんなところで如何しました？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "? Is there something wrong with that?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: にっこりと笑って五十六は促す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Isojūroku smiled gently and beckoned me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 五十六がランスの背後に近づき、
マントをそっと取ろうとする。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and quietly tried to take his cloak off.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、なんか、妙にサービス良くないか？」
おそらく大陸とでは文化が違うのですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's probably that the culture is different from the continent."
she is supposed to devote herself to her husband.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 正室や側室の関係ではありませんが、
私はランス殿の子を産んだ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but I have borne Sir Rance's child...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「家族であることに変わりはありません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That does not change the fact that we are family."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「JAPANでは妻は旦那にこうするものですが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In JAPAN, the wife does this for her husband... Is there something strange about that?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これがJAPANの一般的な妻なのか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So this is the typical wife in JAPAN..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （相変わらず、形式にこだわる石頭だ……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (As always, such a blockhead obsessed with formalities...)
If that’s the case, then it’s fine."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「では、お食事になさいますか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now, would you like to have a meal?
"How is the taste of the food...? I hope it suits your palate..."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When I opened the sliding door to the room,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中では五十六が三つ指ついて頭を下げていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inside, Isojūroku was kneeling on three fingers and bowing his head.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「先程、ランス殿が私の部屋に来られるというので、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Earlier, since Sir Rance said he would come to my room,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここでお待ちしておりました」
「三十分くらいはあったが……マジか……」
「？　そんなところで如何しました？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "? Is there something wrong with that?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: にっこりと笑って五十六は促す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Isojūroku smiled gently and beckoned me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 五十六がランスの背後に近づき、
マントをそっと取ろうとする。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and quietly tried to take his cloak off.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、なんか、妙にサービス良くないか？」
おそらく大陸とでは文化が違うのですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's probably that the culture is different from the continent."
she is supposed to devote herself to her husband.

私はランス殿の子を産んだ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but I have borne Sir Rance's child...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「家族であることに変わりはありません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That does not change the fact that we are family."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「JAPANでは妻は旦那にこうするものですが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In JAPAN, the wife does this for her husband... Is there something strange about that?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これがJAPANの一般的な妻なのか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So this is the typical wife in JAPAN..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （相変わらず、形式にこだわる石頭だ……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (As always, such a blockhead obsessed with formalities...)
If that’s the case, then it’s fine."
